summary: Frontend testing for cache-first performance overhaul on 3 profile pages: orders.tsx, purchases.tsx, saved.tsx. FIXED: Added missing ActivityIndicator import to orders.tsx and purchases.tsx. All pages load instantly without full-page spinners.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed 2 files with missing ActivityIndicator import from react-native: orders.tsx, purchases.tsx
orders.tsx line 355 uses ActivityIndicator for inline button loading state (Mark as Shipped) - import was required
purchases.tsx lines 192 and 305 use ActivityIndicator for inline button loading states (Confirm Received) - import was required
saved.tsx correctly did not need ActivityIndicator import (no usage found in the file)
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented using getCachedSync/setCacheSync - pages render instantly with cached or empty state

bug_fixes.issue: ActivityIndicator used on line 355 (Mark as Shipped button loading state) but not imported from react-native
ActivityIndicator used on lines 192 and 305 (Confirm Received button loading state in OrderItem and DesktopOrderCard) but not imported from react-native

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 185 verified cache-first pattern for 3 more profile pages: /profile/orders, /profile/purchases, /profile/saved. Fixed 2 bugs - orders.tsx and purchases.tsx were missing ActivityIndicator import (used for inline button loading states). All pages load instantly without full-page spinners. Total pages refactored this session: 34 (8 settings + 4 property + 5 auto/checkout + 4 blog/premium/tabs + 5 profile + 5 batch183 + 3 current batch).
